cookies_policy.title: Cookies Policy
cookies_policy.description: In our application, we use cookies to improve the user experience and provide essential functionalities for login.

what_are_cookies.title: What are Cookies?
what_are_cookies.description: A cookie is a small text file stored in the user's browser when they access our application. These cookies allow our application to remember information about the user's session.

use_of_cookies.title: Use of Cookies
use_of_cookies.description: In our application, we use the following cookies:

items.jwt: JWT: This cookie stores the Authentication Token (JWT) required for login. It allows users to remain authenticated during their session.

consent.title: Consent
consent.description: We do not require explicit consent for the use of this cookie, as it is necessary for the operation of the application and is not used for advertising or analytics purposes.

disable_cookies.title: How to Disable Cookies
disable_cookies.description: Users can configure their browser to block or delete cookies. However, this may affect the functionality of the application, especially login and access to personalized features.

policy_changes.title: Changes to this Cookies Policy
policy_changes.description: We reserve the right to modify this Cookies Policy at any time. Changes will be notified to users through the application. It is recommended to review this policy periodically.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.description: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect the personal information of users of our personal finance management application.

info_we_collect.title: Information We Collect
info_we_collect.description: We collect the following personal information when users create an account in our application:

items.username: Username: To identify users on our platform.
items.first_name: First Name: To personalize the user experience.
items.last_name: Last Name: To complete the user profile.
items.email: Email: For sending notifications and account recovery.
items.password: Password: To protect access to the user’s account.

use_of_info.title: Use of Information
use_of_info.description: We use this information solely to provide users with personal finance management on a visual level. This includes:

items.send_notifications: Sending notifications related to the account and application updates.

use_of_info.no_third_party: We do not share this information with third parties.

data_retention.title: Data Retention
data_retention.description: Personal data will be retained until the user decides to delete their account. Once the account is deleted, all data will be permanently removed from our systems.

user_rights.title: User Rights

items.access: Access: Request access to their personal data.
items.rectification: Rectification: Request correction of inaccurate data.
items.deletion: Deletion: Request deletion of their account and personal data.

user_rights.exercise_rights: They can exercise these rights through the options available in their user profile within the application.

security.title: Security
security.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect users’ personal information, including:

items.access_control: Access controls to limit who can access personal information.

jurisdiction.title: Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.description: Our application operates globally. By using our application, users agree that their personal data may be processed and stored in any country where we operate. We are committed to complying with applicable data protection laws.

policy_changes.title: Changes to this Policy
policy_changes.description: We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be notified to users through the application or by email. It is recommended to review this policy periodically.

q1.title: How can I change my password?
q1.content: To change your password, navigate to the 'Security and Privacy' section in your user settings. Enter your current password, followed by the new password and confirmation, and click 'Change Password'.

q2.title: How do I delete my account?
q2.content: You can delete your account by going to the 'Security and Privacy' section, clicking 'Delete Account', entering your username, and confirming the action.

q3.title: How do I update my profile image?
q3.content: Go to your user settings and click 'Change Image'. You can upload a new profile picture or delete your current one by clicking 'Delete Image'.

q4.title: How do I manage my account categories?
q4.content: To manage categories, go to the 'Categories' section in your account settings. Here you can add, edit, or delete categories associated with your movements.

q5.title: What should I do if I forgot my password?
q5.content: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login screen. Enter your email, and a reset token will be sent to you. Use that token to reset your password.

q6.title: How do I see my financial movements by year?
q6.content: You can view your financial movements for a specific year by going to the 'Movements' section. Select the year you want to filter, and all movements for that year will be displayed.

q7.title: How can I update my account language?
q7.content: To update your preferred language, navigate to your profile settings, select your language from the dropdown menu, and click 'Confirm Changes'.

q8.title: Can I recover my account after deletion?
q8.content: No, once your account is deleted, it cannot be recovered. Make sure you have backed up any important information before proceeding.
